"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Sɛ obiara yɛ bɔn
, #Nka 5.5-8": dɛ odzi EWURADZE afomfonsɛm
column4: na odzi akɔhwi wɔ ne nyɛnko adzesiedze ho asɛm mu

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "anaa oehu dza ɔyewee na odzi akɔhwi wɔ mu
, #Nka 5.5-8": na ɔka ntanhun a

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Sɛ ɔba dɛ ɔayɛ bɔn
, #Nka 5.5-8": na odzi so a
column4: ɔmfa adze a ɔfaa no afoadze mu
column5: anaa adze a onyaa no emim mu
column6: anaa adzesiedze a wɔdze hyɛɛ ne nsa
column7: anaa adze a ɔyewee a ohunii
column9: "anaa adze biara a ɔaka ho ntanhun no no nsan mbra; na ɔmbɛhyɛ ananmu ara pɛ
column10: na ɔmfa ebupɛn enum mu kor so nto do mfa mma nyia adze no yɛ nedze no
column11: wɔ da a woehu no dɛ odzi so no ara mu."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na ɔmfa n'asodzii ho afɔr mbrɛ EWURADZE
, #Nka 5.5-8": nguan mu oguannyin a onndzii dzɛm
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ebo a etwa tse
column5: mfa mbrɛ ɔsɔfo no nyɛ asodzi ho afɔr:"

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no wɔ EWURADZE enyim
, #Nka 5.5-8": na wɔdze adze biara a ɔayɛ a odzi ho so no bɛkyɛ no."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Hyɛ Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no dɛ
column5: Iyi nye ɔhyew afɔr ho mbra: ɔhyew afɔr no nko mbukyia no do wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do anadwe araa nkodu anapa; na afɔrmbukyia no do ogya no nsuo mu ndzɛw."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na ɔsɔfo no nhyɛ no ndwera atar
, #Nka 5.5-8": na ɔnhyɛ no ndwera ntwontwo nkata noho; na ɔnsesaw nso no a ogya a ɔhyeew ɔhyew afɔr no gyae wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do no
column4: na ɔmfa ngu afɔrmbukyia no nkyɛn."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na onyi ne ntar no
, #Nka 5.5-8": na ɔnhyɛ ntar fofor
column4: na ɔmfa nso no mfir edzi nkɔ nseraban no ekyir nkogu beebi mbrɛ ɔtsew."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na afɔrmbukyia no do ogya no nda ho ndzɛw wɔ do
, #Nka 5.5-8": mma onndum ara da; na ɔsɔfo no nhyew do nyena anapa daa: na onsiesie ɔhyew afɔr no yie wɔ do
column4: na ɔnhyew asomdwee afɔr no seradze no wɔ do."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Ogya nkɔ do ndzɛw afɔrmbukyia no do daa; mma onndum ara da."
"Na iyi nye edziban afɔr ho mbra: Aaron ne mbabanyin no mfa mbra EWURADZE enyim
, #Nka 5.5-8": wɔ afɔrmbukyia no enyim."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na ɔmfa mu ne nsapuw
, #Nka 5.5-8": edziban afɔr isiam pa no bi
column5: nye edziban afɔr no do krɔbɔw no nyinara
column6: na ɔnhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na ne nkaa no
, #Nka 5.5-8": Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no ndzi: wondzi no epitsi wɔ mbrɛ ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn; ehyiadzibuw no ne pampamu mu na wondzi."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Mma wɔmmfa mbɔrkaw nnka ho nnto. Hɔn kyɛfa a medze ama wɔ me gya afɔr mu nye no; ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn
, #Nka 5.5-8": dɛ bɔn ho afɔr

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Aaron ne mba mu banyin biara ndzi bi
, #Nka 5.5-8": dɛ EWURADZE ogya afɔr ho daa ahyɛdze
column4: nkodu hom ebusuasantsen do: obiara a ɔka no no nyɛ krɔnkrɔn."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Iyi nye Aaron nye ne mbabanyin ayɛyɛdze a wɔmfa mbrɛ EWURADZE wɔ da a wɔasera no ngo no mu; isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu kor nyɛ daa edziban afɔr

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Wɔmfa ngo nka ho nyɛ no wɔ ɔtosɛn mu; sɛ ɔhon a
, #Nka 5.5-8": fa bra: yɛ no dɛ edziban afɔr a wɔato ebubu mu esinesin bra
column4: ma onyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na ɔsɔfo no a wɔasera no ngo no a ɔbɛhyɛ n'ananmu wɔ ne mbabanyin mu no mfa mbra: wɔnhyew no mu nyɛ EWURADZE daa mmom."
"Na ɔsɔfo no n'edziban afɔr biara wɔnhyew no mu: mma wonndzi bi."
"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Kasa kyerɛ Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no dɛ
column5: Iyi nye bɔn ho afɔr abowa ho mbra: beebi mbrɛ woku ɔhyew abowa afɔr no hɔ ara na wonku bɔn ho afɔr no wɔ EWURADZE enyim: Ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Ɔsɔfo a ɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr no ndzi: wondzi no wɔ mbrɛ ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn wɔ ehyiadzibuw no ne pampamu."
"Biribiara a ɔka ne nam no nyɛ krɔnkrɔn: na sɛ no bɔgyaa petse atar biara do a
, #Nka 5.5-8": hor dza apetse do no wɔ mbrɛ ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn."

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Mbom dɛtsesɛn a wɔanoa no wɔ mu no wɔmbɔ no: na sɛ wɔnoa no boransɛn mu a
, #Nka 5.5-8": wontwuw mu

"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Banyin biara a ofi asɔfo ebusuakuw mu no ndzi bi: ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn."
"Na bɔn ho afɔr biara a wɔdze no bɔgyaa bi ba ehyiadzibuw no mu bɛpata wɔ bea krɔnkrɔn no
, #Nka 5.5-8": mma wonndzi: wɔmfa ogya nhyew no."
